       <div id="wrapbox20672940">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20672940">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20672940">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content20672940">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>

           </a>

           Business Subject Specialist

            kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
          </p>

           <br />
           Sciences Subject Specialist

           <br />
           email:
           <a href="mailto:rhamelers@muhlenberg.edu">
            rhamelers@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20672940" class="boxatt">

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20672944">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20672944">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20672944">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Industry News and Analysis in Periodical Literature
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20672944">
          <div id="boxatt20672944" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24139038">
              <a id="link_24139038" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24139038,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Business and Society', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24132778">
              <a id="link_24132778" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bth" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24132778,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Business and Society', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19721252}); ">
               Business Source Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through library subscription. An "aggregator database" containing the full text of trade journals and other business periodicals. Known for its subject indexing. Strong on information about both industries and companies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25199348">
              <a id="link_25199348" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25199348,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Business and Society', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24133719">
              <a id="link_24133719" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24133719,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Business and Society', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344568}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more, with coverage in the main from 1980 to present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24142695">
              <a id="link_24142695" href="http://search.proquest.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/publication/10482" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24142695,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Business and Society', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23403842}); ">
               Wall Street Journal via Proquest 1984 to present
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. The "paper of record" of the business world. Proquest version contains full text archive 1923-today. No charts or graphs
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21713172">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21713172">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21713172">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Industry Overviews in Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21713172">
          <div id="boxatt21713172" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25199356">
              <a id="link_25199356" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25199356,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Business and Society', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25199359">
              <a id="link_25199359" href="http://books.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25199359,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Business and Society', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19973860}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Offers previews of books, with link to interlibrary loan.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20672943">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20672943">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20672943">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Proprietary Industry Reports
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20672943">
          <div id="boxatt20672943" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24133714">
              <a id="link_24133714" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bth" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24133714,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Business and Society', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19721252}); ">
               Business Source Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through library subscription. An "aggregator database" containing the full text of trade journals and other business periodicals. Known for its subject indexing. Strong on information about both industries and companies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25284496">
              <a id="link_25284496" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;res_id=info%3Asid%2Fgale%3AGVRL&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi%2Ffmt:kev:mtx:journal&amp;rft.isbn=9781414486864&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:oclc.org:mul_coll" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25284496,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Business and Society', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13228948}); ">
               Encyclopedia of American Industries
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides detailed, comprehensive information on a wide range of industries in every realm of American business. The work consists of more than 1,000 detailed profiles of the manufacturing and service industries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24132776">
              <a id="link_24132776" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24132776,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Business and Society', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24132776}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Click on "Browse Sources" and then choose "Industry" and then the type of industry you are researching. Then choose relevant publications.  The BMI publications are especially good.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21808363">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21808363">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21808363">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Marketing Histories in Reference Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16649316">
          <div id="boxatt16649316" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22656245">
              Advertising Age Encyclopedia of Advertising
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (Call # 659.103 A244a (B level), or ON RESERVE for BUS 239 at Trexler Library front desk.)
               <br />
               Hundreds of major advertising campaigns.
               <br />
               <a href="http://libapp.muhlenberg.edu/cannon/advertising_age_index_one.pdf">
                Index A-J
               </a>
               .
               <a href="http://libapp.muhlenberg.edu/cannon/advertising_age_index_two.pdf">
                Index J-Z
               </a>
               .
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19672807">
              Encyclopedia of Consumer Brands
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (Call #  658.8343 E56o (B level), or ON RESERVE for BUS 239 at Trexler Library front desk.)
               <br />
               History of major name brands worldwide and their associated campaigns.
               <br />
               <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/library/guides/libinst/abe/encyclopediaconsumerbrands.pdf">
                Index
               </a>
               .
               <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/library/guides/libinst/abe/consumerbrands.pdf">
                List by industry
               </a>
               .
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22966620">
              <a id="link_22966620" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;res_id=info%3Asid%2Fgale%3AGVRL&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi%2Ffmt:kev:mtx:journal&amp;rft.isbn=9781558628540&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:oclc.org:mul_coll" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22966620,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Business and Society', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22966620}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Global Brands
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Contains 270 entries, written in case-study style, that highlight interesting details including how a product originated and was first marketed, how it developed commercially and how it fares today compared with its competitors and its own past history. Included are anecdotes pertaining to the famous, or infamous, marketing strategies and advertising campaigns that managed to capture the sometimes jaded viewers' attention
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19673731">
              Encyclopedia of Major Marketing Campaigns
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (Call # 659.1 E56o (B level), or ON RESERVE for BUS 239 at Trexler Library front desk.)
               <br />
               History of major name brands worldwide and their associated campaigns.
               <br />
               Index
               <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/library/guides/libinst/abe/majormktgcampvol1.pdf">
                vol. 1
               </a>
               and
               <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/library/guides/libinst/abe/majormktgcampvol2.pdf">
                vol. 2
               </a>
               .
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23716128">
              <a id="link_23716128" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://go.galegroup.com/ps/i.do?id=GALE%7C9781414406077&amp;v=2.1&amp;u=mul_coll&amp;it=etoc&amp;p=GVRL&amp;sw=w" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23716128,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Business and Society', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23716128}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Major Marketing Campaigns vol. 2
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               History of major name brands worldwide and their associated campaigns.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19720906">
              <a id="link_19720906" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/5XFA" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19720906,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Business and Society', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19720906}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Major Marketing Strategies
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available online. This volume is a continuation of the Encyclopedia of Major Marketing Campaigns.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5515365" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20672945">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20672945">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20672945">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20672945">
          <div id="boxatt20672945" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24117594">
              <a id="link_24117594" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24117594,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Business and Society', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24117594}); ">
               Trexler Library Citation Guides
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief, easy-to-use guides to the 3 most used citation styles: APA, Chicago (Turabian), MLA.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
